attributes.action: Intervene to prevent Channel Four from screening the final moments of Princess Diana.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the screening is not in any way in the public interest.  The Government and the public should support the two Princes in their desire to have this programme banned, or at least all references to the Princess's final moments removed.  Only people who are rather sick would want to watch this anyway.  Clearly, the Channel Four Chief Executuves have no sense of what is right and are only interested in sensation and Viewer appeal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
